attributes.action: apologise to the nation for the callous way in which he dealt with the death of one of the most vulnerable members of the society he is supposed to protect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister's conduct in this week's PMQ's (12/10/2008) was simply unnacceptable. He did not even attempt to answer the questions put to him regarding the death of baby P and then tried to silence the opposition by throwing accusations of playing party politics. The Prime Minister needs to apologise to those he serves for this discraceful behaviour. Then he needs to instigate a full public inquiery into the matter and persue criminal charges where possible.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
